FBI director admits pre-Marathon lapse

Robert S. Mueller III acknowledged on Thursday that a lack of formal communication within the agency may have prevented investigators from alerting Russian officials that Tamerlan Tsarnaev had returned to Russia before the Boston Marathon bombing, information that Russian authorities say could have averted the act of terrorism.

US to step up military support of Syria rebels

The White House said Thursday that the US has evidence that the Syrian government used chemical weapons against forces trying to overthrow its leader.
